name: LouderWithCrowder
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Louder with Crowder is a popular show on CRTV and YouTube hosted by Steven Crowder. Also on the show are people such as Not Gay Jared, Gerald Morgan, Half-Asian Lawyer Bill Richmond, and Sven Computer the German intern. They present news in a humorous manner as well as bring on a wide-variety of guests. The website, louderwithcrowder.com, contains the news stories mentioned previously.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
